description: Probe opens up with a spotlight on Jerek, the Fisting Bottom ofthe Year, taking the hand of a new, stunning, New York- basedhairy latin heartthrob (and never before filmed!) named Asoka. Jerek,with his GQ Face and Fist-Me Ass is the perfect partner for this newlydiscovered expert handball top. And if there is a love affair going on, itis between Jerek's Mark Evrett-style ass lips and Asoka's firm arm.And if you thought that the Star of Bethlehem shone bright, youshould see the stellar sparkle in Jerek's eyes as he receives one ofthe greatest poundings of all time. Stunning lighting, beautiful camerawork, and some of the best Full Throttle fisting ever filmed givesProbe an opening scene blast off that simply must be seen tobe understood.
title: Probe, Scene #01
